name: Performance Analyst
description:
For more than 15 years, IPONWEB has been creating innovative projects that allow expanding opportunities in the field of media trading. We are world leaders among companies that create AdTech technologies and infrastructure.

The role’s purpose is to have the Latest Estimates roll-forward forecast properly prepared on a monthly basis in collaboration with Portfolio and Vertical leaders, incorporating historical trends, seasonality, similar case patterns, business insights and assumptions, previous forecasts. Another interlinked purpose is to have Portfolio and Vertical leaders to understand financial and relevant operational performance from different perspectives: historically, vs. budget / previous LE forecasts, vs. changes in other P&L items.

The position requires analytical skills to investigate business cases (with sensitive variations), challenge assumptions of business groups, find mistakes/inconsistencies in data, check managerial reporting data.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Prepare monthly analytical reports to explain actual variations of financial performance from different perspectives: historically, vs. budget / previous LE forecasts, vs. changes in other P&L items;

  • Lead monthly LE meetings with portfolio managers to explain results of the last month and update the forecast;

  • Prepare monthly analytical reports to overview forecast updates made on portfolio level and communicate them to Vertical leaders, as well as overview for Verticals -> Group leaders;

  • Maintain and update LE models to reflect updates of client business models, new clients, and client redistribution between divisions;

  • Analyzing labor allocations to portfolio/verticals, discussing results with portfolio managers, investigating anomalies, posting updates, chasing bad reporters / raising issues to relevant managers;

  • Maintaining labor and HW allocations models, as well as supporting headcount and RU labor files;

  • Analyzing client trends to set baselines for trend-based forecasts;

  • Enriching forecasting data with relevant perspectives to support annual/semiannual budgets;

  • Maintain managerial reporting dictionaries and mapping tables;

  • Ad hoc tasks regarding:

    • benchmark analysis of financial performance of main players in the industry, including: analyzing public financial reports and industry trends;

    • financial planning for new initiatives;

  • Other work based on the direct manager requests.

Role Requirements:

  • Master’s degree in Math or economics;

  • 3-7 years of business experience;

  • Good command of English;

  • Analytical and reasoning skills;

  • Goal-oriented and willingness to roll up sleeves and meet deadlines;

  • Reliable.

We offer you:

  • Career opportunity within High Tech international company - one of the leaders in the Programmatic Marketing industry;

  • Open and approachable management team with strong engineering DNA (80% of Moscow office - engineers, managers and executives with technical background);

  • Internal pathways for career development and professional growth, supported by Performance Management System;

  • Competitive compensation package;

  • Corporate Health Insurance Program or Voluntary Insurance Program (VMI);

  • Internal and external learning courses both for professional and soft skills development;

  • English Corporate Programs;

  • Relocation Program for you and your family from any region of Russia to Moscow office;

  • Full flexibility outside our core working hours 12:00-18:00;

  • Referral Bonus Program;

  • Recognition of employee milestones.

IPONWEB provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to sex, race, religion, national origin, age, sexual orientation, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, IPONWEB complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.
